Sentencas: The Sr-free mixed ionic electronic conducting perovskites La0.8Ca0.2FeO3-delta (LCF82) and Pr0.8Ca0.2FeO3-delta (PCF82) were synthesized via a glycine-nitrate process.
Titulo: Strontium-free rare earth perovskite ferrites with fast oxygen exchange kinetics: Experiment and theory

Sentencas: Crystal structure, phase purity, and lattice constants were determined by XRD and Rietveld analysis.
Titulo: Strontium-free rare earth perovskite ferrites with fast oxygen exchange kinetics: Experiment and theory

Sentencas: The oxygen exchange kinetics and the electronic conductivity were obtained from in-situ dc-conductivity relaxation experiments at 600-800 degrees C and 1x10(-3)<= pO(2)/bar <= 0.1.
Titulo: Strontium-free rare earth perovskite ferrites with fast oxygen exchange kinetics: Experiment and theory

Sentencas: Both LCF82 and PCF82 show exceptionally fast chemical surface exchange coefficients and chemical diffusion coefficients of oxygen.
Titulo: Strontium-free rare earth perovskite ferrites with fast oxygen exchange kinetics: Experiment and theory

Sentencas: The oxygen nonstochiometry of LCF82 and PCF82 was determined by precision thermogravimetry.
Titulo: Strontium-free rare earth perovskite ferrites with fast oxygen exchange kinetics: Experiment and theory

Sentencas: A point defect model was used to calculate the thermodynamic factors of oxygen and to estimate self-diffusion coefficients and ionic conductivities.
Titulo: Strontium-free rare earth perovskite ferrites with fast oxygen exchange kinetics: Experiment and theory

Sentencas: Density Functional Theory (DFT) calculations on the crystal structure, oxygen vacancy formation as well as oxygen migration energies are in excellent agreement with the experimental values.
Titulo: Strontium-free rare earth perovskite ferrites with fast oxygen exchange kinetics: Experiment and theory

Sentencas: Due to their favourable properties both LCF82 and PCF82 are of interest for applications in solid oxide fuel cell cathodes, solid oxide electrolyser cell anodes, oxygen separation membranes, catalysts, or electrochemical sensors.
Titulo: Strontium-free rare earth perovskite ferrites with fast oxygen exchange kinetics: Experiment and theory
